import sys

t = int(sys.stdin.readline())

for a in range(t):
    nrelem = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    elem = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    for a in range(nrelem-1):
        if a%2==0:
            if elem[a]>elem[a+1]:
                var=elem[a]
                elem[a]=elem[a+1]
                elem[a+1]=var
        else:
            if elem[a]<elem[a+1]:
                var = elem[a]
                elem[a]=elem[a+1]
                elem[a+1]=var
    for a in elem:
        print a,
